price: 198. Y si los invitas al buen camino, no te escuchan; y ves que te miran, pero no ven.
arabic: وَإِن تَدۡعُوهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰ لَا يَسۡمَعُواْۖ وَتَرَىٰهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيۡكَ وَهُمۡ لَا يُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-in tadʿūhum ilā al-hudā lā yasmaʿū watarāhum yanẓurūna ilayka wahum lā yub'ṣirūna
